text: Vaalu is a 2015 Indian"Santhu Straight Forward" is not a remake of "Vaalu" . Times of India" (7 March 2015). Retrieved on 2019-09-02. Tamil-language romantic action comedy film written and directed by debutante Vijay Chandar. The film stars Silambarasan and Hansika Motwani, with Santhanam, VTV Ganesh and Brahmanandam portraying supporting roles. The film was produced by S. S. Chakravarthy under the banner NIC Arts. S. Thaman composed the music while Sakthi and T. S. Suresh handled the cinematography and editing respectively. == References == == Other websites == * Category:Romantic comedy movies Category:Indian movies Category:2015 movies
title: Vaalu
